rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An inviting entrance with a Vastu compliant east facing door. Includes built-in seating and decor matching the Art Deco theme.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with Art Deco accents, large windows for natural light, and accessible layout for wheelchair users.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open dining space integrated with the kitchen for a seamless flow; designed to be Vastu aligned, ensuring positive energy circulation.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with soundproofing and ergonomic features, wheelchair accessible design with ample space for equipment and movement.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Art Deco styling elements; appliances arranged as per Vastu guidelines to promote harmony in the home environment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Large master bedroom on the ground floor, designed for wheelchair accessibility, incorporating Vastu principles with the bed placed diagonally opposite from the door.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Accessible guest room following Vastu norms; includes built-in storage and seating areas to enhance functionality.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom with safety features, designed in Art Deco style while respecting Vastu recommendations for placement relative to the bedroom.
